price: 51. Yalli isi naqoosak namma Yalla ma haysitinaay maqbudina, cagalah sin Yallay qibaada cakkisita usuk inki Yalla kinnik, toysa yoo inkittoysaay yoo uqbudaay yok meesita keenik iyye.
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱللَّهُ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓاْ إِلَٰهَيۡنِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِۖ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ فَإِيَّٰيَ فَٱرۡهَبُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-lahu lā tattakhidhū ilāhayni ith'nayni innamā huwa ilāhun wāḥidun fa-iyyāya fa-ir'habūni
